Name: United Empire of Earth Mini-Flag
Description: Celebrate the United Empire of Earth (UEE) wherever you go by flying a holographic version of the flag. The small and sleek stands makes it an ideal accessory for a desk or ship. Featuring a vibrant blue color offset by white, this iconic symbol incorporated iconography from the previous UPE flag to represent the next phase of Humanity's united government as it grew into a massive empire.
